full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'GO BA'I LHA LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI GTOR MA BSHAMS TSUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021B (GTOR MA 'DI NI LAG LEN 'DI NI RGYAL DBANG GTER ZHUNG ZHAL 'PHANGS MDZAD PA NI 'DI YIN NAM SNYAM, ,SARBA WANTU, ,DGE'O, ,` YANG GCIG LUGS LA DKAR GTOR ZLUM PO'I LNGA DANG RIL BU BSKOR BA DANG MCHOD PA SPYAN GZIGS CI 'BYOR BSHAMS TSUL NI KU SHRI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG MDZAD PA'O, ,)
